TEXT.TITLE: ANECO REINSURANCE CO LTD <ANECF> YEAR NET
TEXT.BODY: Shr profit 80 cts vs loss 1.60 dlrs Net profit 1,673,960 vs loss 3,292,663 NOTE: 1986 net includes gain on bond portfolio of 1,160,000 dlrs and 5,600,000 dlr provision for losses on discontinued liability and multi-peril lines of reinsurance. Reuter
